snippet: Employers posted 4.63 million jobs, a 3.8 percent increase from April’s total of 4.46 million. That was the fourth straight strong gain and the highest number since June 2007.
abstract: Bureau of Labor Statistics says that employers advertised more jobs in May than in any month in past seven years; employers posted 4.63 million jobs, 3.8 percent increase from April's total of 4.46 million.
lead_paragraph: Employers posted 4.63 million jobs, a 3.8 percent increase from April’s total of 4.46 million. That was the fourth straight strong gain and the highest number since June 2007.
